trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event occurs before a row is painted on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>evento si verifica prima che una riga viene disegnata su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> enables you to manually adjust the appearance of the row before any of the cells in the row are painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>Consente di regolare manualmente l'aspetto della riga prima di qualsiasi cella nella riga sono stato generato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to customize the row, such as to produce a row where the content of one column spans multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile se si desidera personalizzare la riga, ad esempio, per produrre una riga in cui il contenuto di una colonna si estende su più colonne.

trans-unit.source: Use the properties in DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs to get the settings of the row without directly accessing the row in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs per ottenere le impostazioni della riga senza accedere direttamente alla riga in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that owns the row that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> cui appartiene la riga che viene disegnata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usato per disegnare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che deve essere disegnato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> contenente i limiti del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> che viene disegnato.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Indice di riga della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valori che specifica lo stato della riga.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the row.
trans-unit.target: Un messaggio di errore che è associato alla riga.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the row.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> che contiene informazioni di formattazione e stile relative alla riga.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare se la riga corrente è la prima riga visualizzata nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare se la riga corrente è l'ultima riga di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che ha il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>proprietà impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: -or- graphics is .
trans-unit.target: -or- graphics is .

trans-unit.source: -or- inheritedRowStyle is .
trans-unit.target: -or- inheritedRowStyle is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che deve essere ridisegnata.

trans-unit.source: The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ClipBounds rappresenta l'area della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>che deve essere ridisegnata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un utente copre l'intero <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>con un'altra finestra e quindi scopre quindi ClipBounds rappresenta l'intera <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Se un utente copre una piccola area della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>quindi scopre ClipBounds rappresenta la piccola area coperta.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che deve essere ridisegnata.

trans-unit.source: Draws the focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il rettangolo di attivazione intorno ai limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: Use the DrawFocus method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo DrawFocus quando si disegna la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>e manualmente il contenuto delle relative celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si disegna manualmente l'intera riga e il contenuto delle relative celle, impostare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>non si verificano.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> </xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the focus area.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che specifica l'area di interesse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the color of the focus rectangle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Utilizzare il <> </> *> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà per determinare il colore del rettangolo di attivazione; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per utilizzare il <> </> *> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che rappresenta un messaggio di errore per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ErrorText property is the same as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà ErrorText è uguale alla riga corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta un messaggio di errore per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare il controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornisce proprietà e metodi utili per il disegno personalizzato.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare il controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style applied to the row.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stile di cella applicato alla riga.

trans-unit.source: The InheritedRowStyle property contains the same values as the row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà InheritedRowStyle contiene gli stessi valori della riga <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Directly accessing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> can affect performance.
trans-unit.target: Accedere direttamente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>può influire sulle prestazioni.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Use InheritedRowStyle in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint> event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare InheritedRowStyle nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>evento per evitare la condivisione della riga e di mantenere le prestazioni ottimali.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>

trans-unit.source: The InheritedRowStyle property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà InheritedRowStyle è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retrieved through the InheritedRowStyle property, the new settings will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene sia possibile impostare le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>recuperati tramite la proprietà InheritedRowStyle, le nuove impostazioni non avranno effetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style currently applied to the row.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> contenente lo stile di cella attualmente applicato alla riga.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la riga corrente è la prima riga visualizzata nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row being painted is currently the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga disegnata è attualmente la prima riga visualizzata nel <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the last visible row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la riga corrente è l'ultima riga visibile il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row being painted is currently the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la riga disegnata è attualmente l'ultima riga di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> che ha il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>proprietà impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified cell parts for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Disegna le parti della cella specificata per l'area compresa nei limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che specifica l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valori che specificano le parti da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell backgrounds for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Disegna sfondi di celle per l'area compresa nei limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: Use the PaintCellsBackground method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo PaintCellsBackground quando si disegna la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>e manualmente il contenuto delle relative celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si disegna manualmente l'intera riga e il contenuto delle relative celle, impostare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>non si verificano.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> </xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che specifica l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per disegnare lo sfondo dei limiti specificati con il colore del <> </> *> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per disegnare lo sfondo dei limiti specificati con il colore del <> </> *> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell contents for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il contenuto della cella per l'area compresa nei limiti specificati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che specifica l'area della <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the entire row header of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disegna l'intera riga di intestazione dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the PaintHeader method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo PaintHeader quando si disegna la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>e manualmente il contenuto delle relative celle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the entire row and its cells' contents, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si disegna manualmente l'intera riga e il contenuto delle relative celle, impostare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>è `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>non si verificano.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> </xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per disegnare l'intestazione di riga con il colore del <> </> *> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per disegnare l'intestazione di riga con il <> </> *> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the row header of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Disegna le parti specificate dell'intestazione di riga della riga corrente.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valori che specificano le parti da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>è minore di zero o maggiore del numero di righe di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo meno uno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The cell parts that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Parti della cella da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valori che specificano le parti da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore specificato durante l'impostazione di questa proprietà non è una combinazione bit per bit valida di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i limiti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width of the RowBounds property is the same as the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza della proprietà RowBounds è la stessa larghezza del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: To get the width of the columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere la larghezza delle colonne di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row index can be used to access the current row within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice di riga può essere utilizzato per accedere alla riga corrente all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata per determinare se la riga è bloccata, sola lettura o selezionato, tra gli altri Stati.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valori che specifica lo stato della riga.
